title: How do I send a multimedia message?
answer:
1. Go to **Messaging** and touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20150430143208334001.jpg).

2. Enter the recipient and compose a message.

3. Touch the menu key then **Add subject**. The message then changes to a multimedia message.

4. Touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20150430143209196002.jpg) to attach pictures, audio clips, or videos to the message.
 5. Click Send
